about.text2: I am a computer entrepreneur and in love with technology.
about.text3: I have worked since 2019 as a Software Architect and developer for the
about.text4: company of which I am Co-Founder
about.text5: My main skills are project architecture and software development focused mainly on Node.js applications.
about.text6: Much of my professional career has been dedicated to software oriented to Microfinance, I also carry out these same tasks applied to the design and development of Backend / Frontend.

projects.title: Projects
projects.card1Content: We created a Web App for room reservations with a Dashboard for managing reservations and staff.
projects.card2Content: System that allows carrying out portfolio and personnel control at the time of disbursing the credits applied to microfinance institutions.
projects.card3Content: Main site of the Arcadius website
